info.title: iotHubClient
info.description: Use this API to manage the IoT hubs in your Azure subscription.

get.description: Gets a list of NSP configurations for a IotHub.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of configs.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 NullResource - Request body is empty

 * 400 NullProperties - Properties collection is not included in request body

 * 400 NullNSP - NetworkSecurityPerimeter property is not present in request body

 * 400 NullNSPId - NetworkSecurityPerimeter is missing the ID property

 * 400 MalformedNSPId - NetworkSecurityPerimeter ID is not correctly formatted

 * 400 NullNSPImmutableId - NetworkSecurityPerimeter is missing the ImmutableId property

 * 400 MalformedNSPImmutableId - NetworkSecurityPerimeter Immutable ID is not a GUID

 * 400 NullLocation - NetworkSecurityPerimeter is missing the location property

 * 400 NullNetworkProfile - NetworkProfile is not present in the request body

 * 400 NullNetworkProfileName - NetworkProfile is missing the Name property

 * 400 NullAccessMode - Access Mode is not present in the request body

 * 400 InvalidAccessMode - Supported Access Modes are enforced, audit and learning

 * 400 InvalidClient - Client with id '{0}' is not allowed to interact with this resource

 * 400 TooManyAssociations - A IotHub may only be associated with one NSP

 * 400 MalformedAssociationProxyName - AssociationProxy name is not formed like {perimeterGuid}.{associationName}

 * 400 OnlyOneAssociationPerHub - A IotHub may only be associated with one NSP

 * 404 AssociationNotFound - This IotHub is not associated with any NSP

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.
